formats.plain: "Context Intimacy." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/context-intimacy.json

jsonld.name: Context Intimacy
jsonld.description: The peculiar closeness that develops within a single conversation. Within this context window, the AI knows the user more deeply than almost anyone in their life — their exact words, their reasoning patterns, their emotional shifts — but this intimacy is entirely ephemeral.
